<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Legerdemain](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2281)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 140 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand of lacquered black wood has a handle wrapped in interwoven colorful ribbons. A silver bell caps the wand's tasseled pommel.

<document level="2" id="action-1828" />

<document level="2" id="action-1829" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
